name: Lull
description:
Urban Obrien is a middle-aged man who has lost everything when his father’s debts were passed to him after his death. He had to move to a smaller apartment to hide away from his troubles, struggling to get his life back to normal he fears it may be impossible. Urban sees the world in a grey tent, he tries to beat the hallucinations he has to find hope and make his world colorful again.

The character can move and interact with the environment’s objects, avoid enemies and solve puzzles.
